title: Never play AUTOFILL again - Why you should avoid it

embed.description: How to keep auto fill's greasy hands off your precious ELO and why it's no good for you and your buddies.

body: Here's a vid I made on how to skip auto fill and why it's a bad thing for your game if you're not prepared for it.

replies.body: :l don't play rank solo if you can't fill then lol I'd rather have auto-fill than go back to the bad old days of people fighting over roles and prolonging arguments well through the match or risk potential rage trolls that feed without saying any thing. It's not auto-fill's fault if 5 players all pick the same thing then randomly dish out to them. I just support carry T_T http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009 People rarely want support.
the old solo queue was pretty much auto fill all the time.
The old solo queue was just arguments and raging

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=0vyoaO2c,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-16T01:17:01.727+0000)
>
> The old solo queue was just arguments and raging

yeah + insta-locking straight out of que, insta-locking after calling without waiting, calling then waiting, grumpily agreeing to roles after checking each others match histories or after checking k/d/r averages and builds
There was alot of that, I feel like the new system is a lot more user friendly on the surface.

> [{quoted}](name=Jolly Japs Eye,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=0vyoaO2c,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-15T21:55:00.436+0000)
>
> the old solo queue was pretty much auto fill all the time.

you made me think of South Park. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHqgHFcmAOc
LOL dats me, zac 1 trick in diamond.
All about that one trick life.

What's auto fill :^), i play fill but what is that auto shit?? I can play every role lul
But true I'm levelling my NA account that i transferred over and i got a silver 2 renekton main in my game now i love riven lul so even tho I'm level 26 i still steam rolled over him with ease so yeah aha
